title: Bug 6125: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing the 'Finish' button, the JAR packager reports the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors 5'.
OB: The JAR packager reports open files very late.
EB: The JAR packager should report open files in a timely manner.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the JAR packager. 2. Press the 'Finish' button. 3. Observe the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors 5'.
